benchmark_details.name: OpenHuEval
benchmark_details.overview: OpenHuEval is the first benchmark for LLMs focusing on the Hungarian language and specifics, providing comprehensive assessment through eight Hungarian-specific dimensions across five tasks with a total of 3953 questions.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the performance of LLMs in handling Hungarian language and its specifics.

data.source: Hungarian-specific materials sourced from various realms including forums, Wikipedia, proverbs, and educational resources.
data.annotation: Manual review by Hungarian language experts and users.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on comparison of model-generated answers with standard answers.
methodology.interpretation: A good performance is indicated by high accuracy scores in tasks designed to evaluate relevant Hungarian-specific knowledge.
methodology.validation: The benchmark was validated by comparing it against existing models and benchmarks, along with expert validation.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: All annotators were informed about data usage and ensured data was void of social bias or ethical concerns.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: Participants provided informed consent for their data to be used.
